Detailed Description

PatientExtension class

Allows for instance-specific fields in the Patients table/model. Patient beforeFind and beforeSave will merge the fields into the Patient data array These fields need not be explicitly queried or saved in code; instead, the Patient model reads the patient_extensions schema to identify them.
